Reviews.Title: selling broken phones
Reviews.Author: Shady
Reviews.Content: the sd card slot was broken and erased 16g of memory and wasted 170 bucks on this phone. it wasnt worth the money and it was broken wtf. beware phone sellers do this all the time and try to make it seem like it was there personal phone knowing it wasnt. knowing its probaly a refurbished phone fixed by them. anyways it been months now and still no refund. thanx amazon for wasting my life and trying to keep my money!

Reviews.Title: Powerfull Phone excellent color
Reviews.Author: Mark V. Epelbaum "Mordechi"
Reviews.Content: I needed a strong phone that can handle lots of heavy data use and still make crisp phone calls. I also did not want to be like everyone else with their black or white phones. By getting this phone in Red I was able to stake my individuality and get a phone that works great and looks sweeeet.I am a mytouch guy and the mytouch 4G is AOK with me

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: Jacob Cordeau
Reviews.Content: I just got the phone in yesterday. I am very impressed! Much better than my old phone. I highly recommend it.The shipping was fast as well.

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes:
Battery
Wall Charger
USB Cable
ProductInfo.Name: T-Mobile myTouch 4G Android Phone, Red (T-Mobile)
